scripts.version:patch: cd packages/cli && npm version patch --git-tag-version false && cd ../.. && git add packages/cli/package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump termweather to $(cat packages/cli/package.json | grep '"version"' | cut -d'"' -f4)" && git tag "v$(cat packages/cli/package.json | grep '"version"' | cut -d'"' -f4)"
